Pattern Library

reviews component

RULES & DEPENDENCIES:

This component will have fields for:

  • quote
  • name (optional)
  • review date (optional)
  • byline (optional)
  • alignment: can be left or center (optional, center is the default)

EXAMPLES:

"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Accusantium aliquam!"
Reviewer #1
byline goes here
2/14/2019
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Accusantium aliquam architecto blanditiis ea impedit ipsum nam odit reiciendis tempore voluptate? Blanditiis consequuntur ea, hic in iusto quaerat quas. Error, provident!"
Reviewer #2
2/14/2019
